title: Ticket #1779: Incorrect description of developers of the CREAM software
description:
One of the developers of CREAM, Massimo Sgaravatto, contacted me about an incorrect attribution in the Condor manual. He wrote: 

In COndor Manual, I see (section 5.3.8 of 7.5 manual):

CREAM is a job submission interface being developed by EGEE at Cern ...

Could you please replace Cern with INFN ?

Could you please make this fix in whatever manuals are appropriate? (7.4? 7.5?) Also, please double-check if it happens anywhere else we discuss CREAM. It might seem small, but it's the kind of detail that can annoy collaborators.

Thank you so much!!
remarks: From Karen: fixed in the 7.4.4 branch of the manual, and it will be carried forward by merges to other manuals.
creator: roy
